Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Mix milk, sugar, cornmeal, eggs, butter, all-purpose flour, and baking powder in a blender until completely smooth, approximately 5 minutes. Pour the mixture into the prepared cake pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean, which takes about 45 minutes. Allow to cool before slicing and serving.
Incorporate 1/2 cup of grated coconut into the batter for an added touch of flavor.
